Jekyll Tags

August 26, 2017
  • Jekyll
  • Code

Thanks to Charlie Park’s tutorial on how to add Tags In Jekyll! I was able to add tags into my blog posts.

The two additional things that I did to make the tags were fully functional were:

  1. Added the following configuration in the _config.yml file for letting Jekyll know which plugins should be used in my site. 
       plugins:
     - tag_gen
  2. Included /thisiswei tag in front of the /tag/, where I had hyperlinks or href. 
       <ul class="tag_list_in_post">
        
     <li class="inline tag_list_item">
       <a class="tag_list_link" href="**/thisiswei**/tag/Jekyll">Jekyll</a>
     </li>
        
     <li class="inline tag_list_item">
       <a class="tag_list_link" href="**/thisiswei**/tag/Code">Code</a>
     </li>
        
   </ul>

Now, it’s time to style them!
